oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General John Hunt Morgan's shaving kit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Razors, strap, and mirror confiscated by Cpl. Andrew Potter, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., from General John Hunt Morgan after Morgan's assassination in Greenville, Tenn. Family legend states that Potter was a member of the party that killed Morgan; and took his shaving kit after the act.
